downloadDescription: This is a guide to running a pilot of Viva Topics, either as a trial or before deploying licenses.
detailsSection: This document provides a template, best practices, and examples for running a successful pilot of Viva Topics. A pilot program is a small-scale, short-term experiment for an organization to understand how a project, system, or product will work across the company. There can be several reasons for running a Viva Topics pilot—such as doing a trial of Viva Topics to decide whether to purchase licenses for your company or as the first step of rolling out Viva Topics to your entire company post-purchase.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft PowerPoint or another application capable of viewing PowerPoint presentations
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
